data.text: @ddiamond @ZekeEmanuel Follow the Polllibg #’s , I mean the Science

@MADinSTL @ddiamond @ZekeEmanuel There’s been a Vax for over a year now, so if we ‘follow the science’ we can come to this same conclusion a year ago, unfortunately 2021 wasn’t an election year. Now we can magically have our freedoms back so we can go vote Dem..

@MooksandMacs @ddiamond @ZekeEmanuel Tell that to families of the 950K people who died or the hospital staff who are dealing w/exhaustion & trauma. COVID isn't & never has been "the flu." The reason we can "live with it" is b/c of scientists & doctors working like crazy to develop effective vaccines & treatments!
@ddiamond @ZekeEmanuel Hundreds of thousands wasted on payroll, to get to the same conclusion doctors have said for over a year.. learn to live with it, just like every virus before it. 🙄
